document_data.name: Dragon's Rest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon's Rest''' was a barracks in the city of [[Arabel]] that was owned by the king and used as a guesthouse for official visitors,
document_data.Location: The Dragon's Rest was located in the north of the city,{{Arabel map orientation}} across from the estate of House [[Marliir]] and the [[Lady's House]], the local temple to [[Tymora]].
